alert.note: Alert for Southern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 8:56PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fairfield County through 945 PM EDT... At 855 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Darien, or over Stamford, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Norwalk, New Canaan, Greenwich, Westport and Darien. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
